trans-unit.source: Allowed tables: Type in a comma seperated list of all allowed tables
trans-unit.target: Allowed tables: Type in a comma seperated list of all allowed tables

trans-unit.source: Allow multiple ratings: In default mode only one click/rating for each element is allowed. The information was saved within a session variable. So, after closing the browser the user can rate again. If you deactivate this checkbox there is no check anymore and the user can rate one single element multiple times. This is also good for debugging.
trans-unit.target: Allow multiple ratings: In default mode only one click/rating for each element is allowed. The information was saved within a session variable. So, after closing the browser the user can rate again. If you deactivate this checkbox there is no check anymore and the user can rate one single element multiple times. This is also good for debugging.

trans-unit.source: Round Result: Round result up to this amount of numbers after the comma. A normal value should be between 0 and 2
trans-unit.target: Round Result: Round result up to this amount of numbers after the comma. A normal value should be between 0 and 2
